Package org.eclipse.ecf.presence.roster

Interface Summary
IRoster Roster (aka contacts list or buddy list)
IRosterEntry Roster entry object.
IRosterGroup Roster group information.
IRosterItem  
IRosterListener Roster update listener
IRosterManager Roster manager for getting access to and changing roster.
IRosterSubscriptionListener Listener for handling notifications of subscribe/unsubscribe requests.
IRosterSubscriptionSender  
 

Class Summary
AbstractRosterManager  
Roster Base class implementation of IRoster.
RosterEntry Roster entry base class implementing IRosterEntry.
RosterGroup Base roster group class implementing IRosterGroup.
RosterItem Base class implmentation of IRosterItem super interface.
